member.name: T:Jibba.XMath
member.summary: The XMath object provides extra mathematical tools

member.name: M:Jibba.XMath.PrimeNumbers(Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive,Microsoft.SmallBasic.Library.Primitive)
member.summary: Gets all prime numbers for a given range
member.returns: CSV values of all primes within the range. Throws an exception if 'to < from' or 'to < 2'. Will be slower for very large ranges. About 5 seconds for 0 to 1,000,000.
